response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and my goal is to ensure that we reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Considering its exceptional quality and the significant impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its full value, providing you with an excellent return on investment. I believe this offer presents an attractive proposition, allowing you to secure this valuable asset without compromising your financial goals. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
